description: Building Capacity to Access Carbon Finance in Albania

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacity of national institutions to manage the environment, protect cultural heritage and regulate economic policies.
subproject.description: Support development of the Albanian public and private sector capacities to access carbon finance in Albania by (i) creating legal and institutional framework for carbon finance and (ii) building in-country capacities for identification, implementation of and resource mobilization for the GHG reduction projects eligible for CDM and other carbon market mechanisms.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Access Carbon Finance in Alban
